channel.title: How do i make so only server's client can connect to server?
channel.description:
Okay... soo, i really wanna do so only server's client can connect to the server and no other client can, this will stop cheatclients and duping clients.. please help thx!
I SEEN SERVER'S WITH IT.. IF YOU TRY CONNECT WITH ANY OTHER CLIENT IT WILL SAY, ; YOU NEED TO BE A MEMBERSTATUS TO CONNECT OR SOMETHING...:s [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 09:19:11 am[/size][hr]?
